channel.title: Making New Pking Areas
channel.description: Im trying to make the duel arena a pking zone. (it is obviously a safe zone atm) How do i make it so the duel arena is a pk area?

item.title: Making New Pking Areas
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >=2726 && absX <=2746 && absY >=3458 && absY <=3477)||(absX >=2997 && absX <=3008&& absY >=3380 && absY <=3387 )|| return true; else return false; }[br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 03:33:37 AM[/size][hr]if(absX >=2726 && absX <=2746 && absY >=3458 && absY <=3477) || (absX >=2997 && absX <=3008 && absY >=3380 && absY <=3387) ||[code][/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 03:41:24 AM[/size][hr]public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >=2726 && absX <=2746 && absY >=3458 && absY <=3477) || (absX >=2997 && absX <=3008 && absY >=3380 && absY <=3387) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; } [code][/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 03:51:56 AM[/size][hr][code]}

if (command.startsWith(“update”) && command.length() > 7) {
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
} [/code]

item.title: Making New Pking Areas
item.dc:creator: @robbie_willi robbie willi
item.description:
@robbie_willi wrote:

well this is what i have: public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) return true; else return false; }

and i want to make the coords: X 3357 Y 3238 X 3357 Y 3226 X 3332 Y 3226 X 3332 Y 3239
Part of wild.

What would i put in my client.java to make them wild?

item.title: Making New Pking Areas
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

open up ur client.jav file search for nonwild it will look something kinda like this

[code]public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >=2887 && absX <=2927 && absY >=9670 && absY <=9698 )||(absX >=2895 && absX <=2923 && absY >=9714 && absY <=9745 )||(absX >=2753 && absX <=2806 && absY >=9177 && absY <=9216 )||(absX >= 3269 && absY >= 2752 && absX <= 3320 && absY <= 2809) || (absX >=2615 && absX <=2669 && absY >=3657 && absY <=3696) || (absX >=3102 && absX <=3119 && absY >=3921 && absY <=3949) ||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}[code]

k find the cords that are at the zone u are wanting to make wild and remove them…heres a example
say i wanted to make these cords wild sw cords X=2887 Y=9670 ne cords X=2927 Y= 9698 i would remove them from the code above like so

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >=2895 && absX <=2923 && absY >=9714 && absY <=9745 )||(absX >=2753 && absX <=2806 && absY >=9177 && absY <=9216 )||(absX >= 3269 && absY >= 2752 && absX <= 3320 && absY <= 2809) || (absX >=2615 && absX <=2669 && absY >=3657 && absY <=3696) || (absX >=3102 && absX <=3119 && absY >=3921 && absY <=3949) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }[code][/code][/code][/code]

Read full topic
